data.text: @nodrogp killing time on twitter and def saw more than a few people talking about this performance. *sigh* it was so good!

@nodrogp My favourite memory of #ArethaFranklin is when Pavarotti pulled out of a performance at the Grammy’s so she stepped in and sang his signature piece, Nessun Dorma. I was not prepared for what I saw. 😭😭😭 https://t.co/lXSQqrSBiK
